about_the_game:
Queens Conquest is a fighting game that takes place in a fantasy world where Holy Knights and Wizards utilize the power of Mana to take down each other.

Experience the fast-paced deep battle system that offers a high degree of freedom of expression and tons of options to develop your own original fighting style and combos.

Choose between the enchanting noble Holy Knight Venicia Celine who specializes in ice and lightning magic or Cedric the mad scrapyard owner who fights Holy Knights with his devastating self made weapon "Dragon Wrecker", and more characters that will be revealed soon!
